definition: lit. to furl up flags and umbrellas (idiom)/fig. to stop what one is doing
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)
banner/flag/(in Qing times) Manchu (cf. 八旗[Ba1 qi2])/administrative subdivision in inner Mongolia equivalent to 縣|县[xian4] county/CL:面[mian4]
scroll/book/volume/chapter/examination paper/classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
to roll up/roll/classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)
